channel.title: I can't attack players for 15 minutes! when someone new starts!
channel.description: When new players log in they can't trade, or attack anyone for 15 minutes. How do I remove that? I am using insidiaX PI.

item.title: I can't attack players for 15 minutes! when someone new starts!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Like RandQm said, look in your attack method for something on a timer.

A timer would look something simple, like this:

if (newPlayerTimer <= 15 && System.currentTimeMillis() - timer >= 60000) { newPlayerTimer ++; timer = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
You’ll see something like this in your attack method:

if(newPlayerTimer <= 15){ sM("Whatever..."); return; }
Also, the timer would be defined somewhere which would need deleting aswell if you have no intent in using it.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't attack players for 15 minutes! when someone new starts!

item.title: I can't attack players for 15 minutes! when someone new starts!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

look in your attack packet and your attack method,
there should be a sort of integer set as timer or something similar, comment out those lines. The name of the variable should tell you wish one it is.

Read full topic
